[windows] skip 'UNIX only'
[!umask:022] skip

chezmoi apply
cmpenv stdout golden/apply

env $=$
chezmoi dump
cmp stdout golden/dump

[!exec:tar] stop

chezmoi archive --output=archive.tar
exec tar -tf archive.tar
cmp stdout golden/archive
